translations: v．排斥，抵制：通过投票或其他方式拒绝接纳某人加入某个团体或组织。

sentences.sentence: Humphrey was kept on by John Major, but was sacked when Tony Blair entered office in 1997, with Cherie Blair thought to have been responsible for blackballing him.
sentences.translation: 约翰·梅杰（John Major）继续收留了汉弗莱，但是托尼·布莱尔（Tony Blair）1997入主之后解雇了它，据说切莉·布莱尔（Cherie）要为对它投反对票负责。
